Name: Raspberry Lynchburg
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
DRIZZLE liqueur around the surface (it will fall through the cocktail).
Review: A berry fruit-influenced riff on a Lynchburg Lemonade .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 1992 by Wayne Collins at Roadhouse , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Raspberry Lynchburg contains 192 calories
